wvPDF(1)                                               wvPDF(1)





NAME
       wvPDF - convert msword documents to PDF

SYNOPSIS
       wvPDF in_word_doc out_pdf_doc

DESCRIPTION
       wvPDF converts word documents into Adobe's PDF format.

REQUIREMENTS
       wvPS distill

MORE INFORMATION
       http://wvware.sourceforge.net

SEE ALSO
       wvAbw(1),  wvWare(1),  wvHtml(1), wvLatex(1), wvCleanLa-
       tex(1),   wvPS(1),   wvDVI(1),   wvRTF(1),    wvText(1),
       wvWml(1), wvMime(1), catdoc(1), word2x(1)

AUTHOR
        Dom Lachowicz (current author and maintainer)
        WEB: http://wvware.sourceforge.net
        MAIL: cinamod@hotmail.com



                                                       wvPDF(1)
